message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Hopefully, we can reach an agreement quickly!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 50% and you get 50%.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40.  Remember, with each round, the money loses value.  Let's find a solution before it's too late!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. Let's not waste more time on negotiations.
